page-oss-intro: Open video infrastructure for an open web.
page-oss-featured-text: Technologies used in Candle’s open source software include Golang, Solidity, Typescript, open source video tools like ffmpeg, and smart contract platforms like Ethereum.
page-oss-featured-go-text: Official Go implementation of the Candle protocol
page-oss-featured-protocol-text: Ethereum smart contracts used for the Candle protocol
page-oss-featured-media-server-text: A golang developer library to enable video ingest, transcoding, streaming, and many other video related features.
page-oss-collaborate-intro: There are many opportunities to collaborate with others in the Candle ecosystem on code both on the video side, and on the blockchain side.
page-oss-collaborate-text-two: Look for “good first issues” in Candle.js (Javascript), LPMS (video development in C or Go), or Go-Candle (go).
page-oss-collaborate-text-three: View the Grant Proposals to see application concepts with some funding attached.
page-oss-collaborate-text-four: Chat with the development team in Discord - we’re a welcoming bunch, so don’t be shy. Ask how you can get involved.
page-oss-collaborate-text-five: Looking to build a video application using Candle? Check out our open developer docs or enterprise hosted services at livepeer.com.
page-oss-meta-description: Open video infrastructure for an open web.
